Features:
~~~~~~~~~~

Virtual private servers provide you with the flexibility and control you expect from dedicated servers at price point of shared hosting.

1. FULL ROOT ACCESS: Full Root Access over the entire Linux Operating System
2. STABLE PLATFORM: Stable OpenVZ Virtualization Technology based Virtual Servers
3. DEDICATED IP: Dedicated IP address with every Virtual Private Servers
4. CONTROL PANEL OPTIONS: Choice of cPanel, Directadmin, Plesk or No Control Panel
5. CHOICE OF OS: Choice of CentOS / Debian / Fedora / Ubuntu distros
6. VPS CONTROL PANEL: Solusvm Control Panel for Boot,Reboot and OS Reload
